step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder and elbow movements were quite accurate in the first repetition. For the second repetition, try to keep your right elbow and wrist closer to the target path.
Good job keeping your shoulders aligned in both repetitions. In the second repetition, your right elbow and wrist deviated more from the path; aim for smoother control.
You did well with your shoulder and left elbow in both repetitions. For the right wrist, try to maintain a more consistent path, especially in the second repetition where it moved further away.
Your shoulders were well-controlled in both repetitions. In the second repetition, your right elbow and wrists stayed closer to the target path, which is great. Keep up that consistency.
Your shoulders were generally well-aligned. In the second repetition, your right elbow and wrists showed more deviation from the target path. Focus on smoother, more controlled movements.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your arms and wrists on a consistent path, especially during the squeezing motion. This will help maximize the benefits for your arm strength and lymph drainage.
